mean_cn: adj.普遍的，总的；一般的，普通的；大致的，笼统的；  n.将军
mean_en: affecting all or most people, places or things;  normal; usual; including the most important aspects of something; not exact or detailed; approximately, but not exactly, the direction/area mentioned; not limited to a particular subject, use or activity; not limited to one part or aspect of a person or thing; highest in rank; chief
sentence: In general, the chart shows an increase.
sentence_trans: 总的来说，这张图呈现了一个上升趋势。
